General.Name: Chai Watana Tannery Group Public Company Limited
General.Description: Chai Watana Tannery Group Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and exports leather-based products. It operates in six segments: Tannery Hide, Automotive Leather Cutting, Dog Chewable Toys, Furniture, Energy Business, and Design and Distribution of Aluminum Boat and Mini Bus. The company offers car seats, steering wheels and gear knobs, and dog chews, as well as quilting, cutting, spray, and beam house and tanning services. In addition, it is involved in the design and distribution of boats and minibuses made from aluminum; generation and sale of electricity using waste; property rental business; provision of consulting services for renewable energy projects; and wholesale of wood chips. Further, the company provides services on waste disposal plants. Chai Watana Tannery Group Public Company Limited was founded in 1972 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.
